org.jdesktop.jdnc
Class LinkHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      org.jdesktop.jdnc.LinkHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
Deprecated. - replaced by RolloverProducer/LinkController/*LinkVisitor. 

public class LinkHandler
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

Handles mouse actions on components with embedded LinkModel objects. This includes with table cells, labels and other controls. When clicked, the LinkModel contents will be displayed in a browser if the applciation is run in an Applet or WebStart application context.

TODO: Should make this general for Trees, TreeTables and lists.

Author:
Mark Davidson
See Also:
org.jdesktop.swingx.data.LinkModel
